entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
